input.prompt:
Implement Phase 5: Complete and Delete Task Functionality

GOAL:  Implement checkbox toggling for completion and delete button for removal

TASKS:
- Implement toggleComplete function that flips the completed boolean for a task
- Update DOM to reflect completed state (apply completed CSS class)
- Bind click on checkbox to toggle completion
- Implement deleteTask function that removes task from array
- Bind click on delete button to remove task
- Re-render task list after any change
- Ensure completion and deletion work immediately without confirmation

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA:
- Clicking checkbox toggles task between complete and incomplete
- Completed tasks show visual styling: #666666 text, line-through, opacity 0.7
- Clicking checkbox again un-completes the task (removes styling)
- Clicking delete button removes the task from the list immediately
- No confirmation dialog appears for delete
- Completed tasks remain visible in the list (not hidden or filtered)
- Empty state appears if all ...
